projects.name: Kayla Bot
projects.description: Kayla Bot is a versatile Discord bot I developed using Python as one of my first personal programming projects.

projects.name: Machine Learning project
projects.description: In this collaborative group project we worked with a complex dataset where we defined the prediction objectives and analysis approach ourselves.

projects.name: Vue Intro Project
projects.description: In this Vue project, I learned the basics and functionalities of Vue.js. The project features components, reactive data, Vue Router, form handling, and API integration through a job board application.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: In this Vue project, I created a fully functional portfolio website, using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS. The project began with a design phase in Figma where I created the initial mockups and UI components before implementing them with code.
